can't advance or retreat (idiom); no room for maneuver/stalled/in a dilemma/stuck in a difficult position

no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation

sentences.english: Tassels on the horns of a dilemma, back to the husbands family and no steps, had to find treasure complex complaint.
sentences.chinese: 流蘇進退兩難，回婆家又沒臺階，只得找寶絡訴苦。

sentences.english: Bones back to a group, a group of sisters said he followed her, and.
sentences.chinese: 魚刺回到一組，一組的姐妹們說自己跟着她共進退。

sentences.english: Teachers are indeed caught in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 老師確實陷入進退兩難的境地。

sentences.english: These things can hunt in the trees as well as on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 這讓毒狼不僅能在地面上狩獵還能在樹上進退自如。

sentences.english: So Kay has been in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 所以，Kay陷入了進退兩難的窘境。
也有許多人都面臨着這樣的進退兩難的處境。

sentences.english: Wang Fang found herself in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 王芳發現自己陷入了進退兩難的地步。

sentences.english: Facing such an outright sexual harassment, the student found herself in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 該女博士生面對這種公然的性騷擾，感到進退兩難。

sentences.english: They will be able to come and go without obstacles, characteristic of an army that belongs to a king or hegemon.
sentences.chinese: 能夠進退無阻的軍隊，那就是圖王稱霸的軍隊了。

sentences.english: If bricks can be some thing, what about you?
sentences.chinese: 做事不能進退兩難，想清楚，不能做牆頭草。

sentences.english: It's simple to be winner, work with winners.
sentences.chinese: 成爲贏家的捷徑是與贏家共進退。

sentences.english: It was precisely at this juncture that the boss found himself in A dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 恰恰在這個時候老闆發現了自己處在進退兩難的境地。

sentences.english: It is time for somebody to teach you to behave yourself.
sentences.chinese: 該是有人教你應對進退之禮儀的時候了。

sentences.english: The stage's in a dilemma, easy or difficult, it looks the same.
sentences.chinese: 進退兩難的階段，說易說難也是相對。

sentences.english: You had to be tactically more aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 你既要進退有度，也要更加激進。
